img_above_text:
![Wukong Mindcliff 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b6/Wukong_Mindcliff_9.jpg)
Along the path, you will find a chest which holds the Fiery Gourd. Continue along the path to also find the Skandha of Thought, one of the Key Items you need to find a secret boss in the game's sixth chapter.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the Gourd customisation items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, Awaken Wine Worm locations, and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Mindcliff 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b6/Wukong_Mindcliff_9.jpg)
Along the path, you will find a chest which holds the Fiery Gourd. Continue along the path to also find the Skandha of Thought, one of the Key Items you need to find a secret boss in the game's sixth chapter."
        - Following Text: "For even more guides and tips on finding all the Gourd customisation items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, Awaken Wine Worm locations, and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a gameplay scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the protagonist exploring a dimly lit cavern. A red circle highlights a chest in the background, which likely contains the Fiery Gourd mentioned in the preceding text. The scene aligns with the guide's instructions to follow the path and collect key items, such as the Fiery Gourd and Skandha of Thought, essential for unlocking a secret boss in Chapter 6.
